channel.title: How would i do this?
channel.description:
Hi I am wanting to make a lyrics website, where people can submit there own lyrics and a link to a video of the song and it gets put into a database and then a page gets created for it
Like i know i would have to make a PHP form and have a mysql database with fields like Video url and lyrics and posted by
i know how to make the form inputting into the database, but how would i make the pages?

item.title: How would i do this?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:21, topic:336403”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=432773.msg3195030#msg3195030 date=1272697278]

[quote author=Pwnd link=topic=432773.msg3191678#msg3191678 date=1272319290]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=432773.msg3185631#msg3185631 date=1271709161]

[quote author=Koolvin link=topic=432773.msg3185228#msg3185228 date=1271658908]
Not really. You have to change the word “maxdb” to the word “mysql”.
[/quote]Please note I said ‘word’, which would include db.

[/quote]You said change the word ‘max’, which does not include anything like ‘db’.
[/quote]When you select the database you still use ‘db’

mysql_select_db($database) or die( "Unable to select database");[/php]

[/quote]for godsake stfu we all know what it’s supposed to be[/quote]This idiot doesn’t:

Koolvin:

Not really. You have to change the word “maxdb” to the word “mysql”.

He seems to be convinced that I was talking about something completely different when I said maxdb instead of mysql.

Read full topic

item.title: How would i do this?

@davidi2 wrote:

No one, but it’s almost the exact same thing for a normal mysql database… just change the word ‘max’.

Read full topic

item.title: How would i do this?
item.dc:creator: @Koolvin Koolvin
item.description:
@Koolvin wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:9, topic:336403”][quote author=Uriko link=topic=432773.msg3181239#msg3181239 date=1271331107]
note, before you read any of this guys ‘tutorials’ for learning purposes, take into consideration this thread
[/quote]Lol’d.

[code=PHP]<php
$link = maxdb_connect(‘host’, ‘user’, ‘pass’);

if ($result = maxdb_query($link, ‘SELECT data FROM database WHERE conditional <= 10’)) {
while ($row = maxdb_fetch_assoc($result)) {
echo $row[‘data’];
}
}
maxdb_free_result($result);
maxdb_close($link);
?>
[/code][/quote]Who said anything about maxdb databases?

Read full topic

item.title: How would i do this?

item.description:

[quote=“Uriko, post:6, topic:336403”]note, before you read any of this guys ‘tutorials’ for learning purposes, take into consideration this thread[/quote]Lol’d.

[code=PHP]<php
$link = maxdb_connect(‘host’, ‘user’, ‘pass’);

if ($result = maxdb_query($link, ‘SELECT data FROM database WHERE conditional <= 10’)) {
while ($row = maxdb_fetch_assoc($result)) {
echo $row[‘data’];
}
}
maxdb_free_result($result);
maxdb_close($link);
?>
[/code]
